title._content: Image taken from page 79 of 'A Plunge into the Sahara. An adventure of to-day ... With illustrations by P. Crampel'

description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A Plunge into the Sahara. An adventure of to-day ... With illustrations by P. Crampel" Author: DEMAGE, G. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 012629.f.57." Page: 79 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1894 Publisher: Sampson Low, Marston & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000903748 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
